title: Carsten’s AI Blog for Economists and Business Majors (coming soon)
text:
Soon (Sept. 2022), you will find here short articles about Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence relevant for economists and business majors.
Currently, you cannot subscribe. However, if you send me an email (clange@cpp.edu), I will add you manually to the subscription list and you get notified when the blog goes live.
See you soon.
Carsten Lange









No matching items

title: About Carsten
text:
Collaborations with other researchers include applying machine learning to the analysis of electronic properties of crystals, predicting urban development with random forest, predicting and interpreting vaccination hesitancy with random forest and Shapley values.
In economics, Lange specializes in economic impact analysis, money supply, inflation, and central bank policy.
